p: In addition to their high toxicity against Anopheles sp. adults, the EOs from Cymbopogon winterianus, Cuminum cyminum, Cinnamomum zeylanicum and Thymus vulgaris possessed repellency and irritant actions by using treated paper technology recommended by the WHO [ 39]. In the repellent tests and at 1%, the proportion of mosquitoes escaping was above those found when permethrin and DEET was used as the positive controls [ 39]. Also, these EOs were irritants as well as DEET and permethrin (positive controls).
